author: Anna Iovine
title: Bumble launches new features to help you date during quarantine
description: On the heels of many dating apps adding new features to make dating a bit easier amid the coronavirus pandemic, Bumble has released a bundle of their own. One is their "Virtual Dating" badge, which, like Hinge's new Date From Home feature, intends to smooth t…
content:
